venue.address_1: Crescent Theater in the basement of Morse College (near the Payne Whitney Gym), 302 York Street, enter across from HGS and Mory'
venue.name: Crescent Theater in Morse College.

item.description:
Fall Show: HIPSTORY, Nov 3-4, 2012, Crescent Theater in Morse College. 8-9:30 pm Saturday, and 2-3:30 pm on Sunday. Join the Yale Belly Dance Society for an exciting tour of belly dance across centuries and continents! Spinning canes, swirling skirts, flying hair, magnificent Isis Wings, swords, shimmies, we've got it all. Location: Crescent Theater in the basement of Morse College (near the Payne Whitney Gym), 302 York Street, enter across from HGS and Mory's, there parking at the gym, or on Broadway. If you are not a Yale undergraduate student, you will need to be let in -- we will have ushers from 7:30-7:55 PM on Saturday and 1:30-1:55 PM on Sunday available to let guests in. Tickets will be available at the door, or use the PayPal link below to purchase tickets in advance to ensure a seat! Please enter the name of the ticket holder -- we will add you to our pre-purchased tickets list. For faster entry at the door, print out your PayPal receipt. Pre-purchased tickets (below) are $5 with Yale or Yale New Haven Hospital email (buying online) or Yale or Yale New Haven Hospital ID (buying in person), and $10 general public. At the door, tickets will be $10 and $15. http://www.yale.edu/bellydance/events/

We can meet up first and go over together....there are plenty of local places to grab a bite or drink before and after.....Gail....

.message me on meetup if you are interested in Sunday instead of Saturday nite the date can change
item.name: Yale Belly Dancing Society
